metadata.dc:author: Saenz de Cabeźon Marti, J
Banús Gassol, J M
de Torres Ramírez, I
Raventós Busquets, C X
Lorente Garín, J A
Tremps Velázquez, E
metadata.dc:description: Presentation of two cases of Leydig cell tumor in adult patients who presented with gynecomastia, and slightly abnormal hormonal profiles. One patient had a non palpable tumor. The pathophysiology of this entity is commented, as well as the importance of the different modalities in its diagnosis.
metadata.dc:title: Dos nuevos tumores testiculares de células de Leydig en el adulto que debutan con ginecomastia.
[Two new Leydig cell testicular tumors presenting with gynecomastia in adults].
